DataElement.preferredName: Gingival Margin Dental Restoration Therapy Recurrent Caries Tooth  9 Recommendation Therapies Specify
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A short text field that describes another treatment a dentist advises with the intended to provide a restoration of the decay of a tooth, in which it becomes softened, discolored, and/or porous ocurring again on the crest of the gingiva surrounding a tooth 9.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Gingival Margin Dental Restoration Therapy Recurrent Caries Tooth  9 Recommendation
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A dentist advising an administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to provide a restoration of the decay of a tooth, in which it becomes softened, discolored, and/or porous ocurring again on the crest of the gingiva surrounding a tooth 9.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The crest of the gingiva surrounding a tooth:Replacement or reconstruction of a lost tooth structure.:An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

Concepts.definition: The crest of the gingiva surrounding a tooth.
Replacement or reconstruction of a lost tooth structure.
An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

Property.preferredDefinition: occurring again.:The decay of a tooth, in which it becomes softened, discolored, and/or porous.:is an organ, the organ parts of which primarily consist of dentine and dental enamel; together with other teeth it constitutes a subdivision of the facial skeleton. Example(s): incisor, molar.:Recommendation; advice telling someone what the best thing to do is.

Concepts.definition: The decay of a tooth, in which it becomes softened, discolored, and/or porous.
The hard bonelike structures in the jaws of vertebrates; primarily used for eating.
Advice telling someone what the best thing to do is.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the free text field related to therapy.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Specify; be specific about something; define clearly.

Concepts.definition: Be specific about something; define clearly.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: released as entered during ISO compliance update

ReferenceDocuments.name: Specify any other treatments
ReferenceDocuments.description: Specify any other treatments not listed above that you would provide for a restoration with evidence of recurrent caries/discoloration around the gingival margin of tooth #9.
